summary: REQ-1 (one-way vs round-trip minimum coverage) appears to be addressed by centralizing trip-type-aware rate/minimum coverage logic in `frontend/src/utils/rates.ts` and consuming it in `frontend/src/components/TripTotalCalculator.tsx`. However, the diff also includes unrelated URL-parameter/deep-link utility changes that were not requested and touch a stated non-goal area (link-sharing/deep-linking features).

hallucinated_features.description: Additional URL parameter utilities related to session persistence/secret parameter handling and a new deep-link parameter helper (customer booking deep-links).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states adding new authentication or link-sharing features is a non-goal and the only requirement is to fix the Trip Total Calculator behavior. The diff shows non-calculator changes in URL/deep-link utilities.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions "new getDeepLinkParameter helper" and other URL/deep-link utilities)
